text: Nakong eo a neng a se a atametse haufi le noka ea Mediane, eaba o fumana banna ba motse ba noesa mehlape. Thokoana mane le bona a bona basetsana ba babeli ba hanetse mohlape oa bona. A re: “Le emetseng moo?” Ba re: “Re ke ke ra noesa mohlape oa rona ho fihlela balisa ba suthile metsing moo; ntat’a rona o se a tsofetse.”
